name: Shapes (itch) (Shimonster)
description:
DOWNLOAD AT THE BOTTOM OF THIS PAGE

Controls:

WASD - Movement

SPACE - Jump / Throw Marker

SHIFT - Toggle Claw Mode

E - Dash

Q - Cancel Dash

(If your computer says the file is a threat, click "More Info" and then "Run Anyways")

Description:

The goal is to kill all the enemies, but some of them are fake. Find the real ones by swapping to claw mode and marking them out. Kill enemies by dashing into them while making sure to preserve energy. Canceling a dash or losing a dash streak loses you energy.

Extra Info:

This game was made to raise awareness for mental illness. Mentally ill individuals are highly under-represented in social media and government, so many can't receive the aid they need to live normal lives with jobs and homes. Here are some organization you can help support:

Anxiety and Depression Association of America

National Alliance on Mental Illness
